removeHandler

boolean removeHandler(EventProcessHandler eph)
Strip a event handler out of whole notification list, in all events. Its overhead seems so costly....

Parameters:
eph - target EventProcessHandler
Returns:
true if any EventProcessHandler is removed, false for otherwise.
